page.title: 01Courteenhall/Quinton Village
page.content: The area contains the two small villages of Courteenhall & Quinton. In Courteenhall is the Stately home of Sir Hereward & Lady Wake. At Quinton Green is the large Farm complex which is run by Mr. R. Turney and only part of his farming interests. The area is a mainly rural one with many scattered farms and houses. The ancient mostly deciduous Salcey forest enters the south east corner. The block is crossed from south east to north west by the M1 Motorway. All other thoroughfares are minor roads, and was crossed by the former SMJ railway. Apart from the two villages 90% of the land is arable and used for growing wheat and oil seed rape, and for grazing for the herds of dairy cattle, the remaining are is forested.
